It does not seem like a great work-around. My guess is that this may not do the right thing with intermediary scipy versions, but I may be wrong about that.

In other words the bug that we reported to scipy was fixed in 0.15 but this one seems slightly different and needs more investigation (I have started digging into it this morning but no completely clear picture right now)
